actions.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B. to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment strikes the Department of Transportation's authority to redistribute unallocated TIFIA funds.
purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to strike the Department of Transportation's authority to redistribute unallocated TIFIA funds.
